TEXT.French: The Power of Manifest Destiny
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Manifest Destiny

TEXT.English: Additional population growth and happiness in cities after immigration and improving resources
TEXT.French: Additional population growth and happiness in cities after immigration and improving resources
TEXT.German: Additional population growth and happiness in cities after immigration and improving resources
TEXT.Italian: Additional population growth and happiness in cities after immigration and improving resources
TEXT.Spanish: Additional population growth and happiness in cities after immigration and improving resources

TEXT.English: Improving a nearby %s1 resource increased population and happiness in %s2.
TEXT.French: Improving a nearby %s1 resource increased population and happiness in %s2.
TEXT.German: Improving a nearby %s1 resource increased population and happiness in %s2.
TEXT.Italian: Improving a nearby %s1 resource increased population and happiness in %s2.
TEXT.Spanish: Improving a nearby %s1 resource increased population and happiness in %s2.

TEXT.English: Recent immigration increased population and happiness in %s1.
TEXT.French: Recent immigration increased population and happiness in %s1.
TEXT.German: Recent immigration increased population and happiness in %s1.
TEXT.Italian: Recent immigration increased population and happiness in %s1.
TEXT.Spanish: Recent immigration increased population and happiness in %s1.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn dans toutes les villes
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn In All Cities

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la foi :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la fe:

TEXT.English: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities
TEXT.French: La religion d'État se propage dans les villes conquises et un lieu de culte y est automatiquement construit
TEXT.German: Ausbreitung der Staatsreligion inklusive Tempeln in eroberten Städten
TEXT.Italian: La religione di stato si diffonde con templi e cattedrali nelle città conquistate
TEXT.Spanish: La religión oficial se propaga con los templos y catedrales a las ciudades conquistadas

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des juntes :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Juntas:

TEXT.English: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.French: Les généraux illustres peuvent déclencher un âge d'or
TEXT.German: Große Generäle können Goldene Zeitalter auslösen
TEXT.Italian: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Great Generals can start Golden Ages

TEXT.French: The Power of Brutality:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Brutality:

TEXT.French: No resistance in conquered cities
TEXT.Spanish: No resistance in conquered cities

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des guerres fleuries :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder del sacrificio:

TEXT.English: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to trigger a short golden age
TEXT.French: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to trigger a short golden age
TEXT.German: Versklavung besiegter feindlicher Einheiten durch Militäreinheiten, can Sklaven opfern, um ein kurzes goldenes Zeitalter zu starten
TEXT.Italian: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to trigger a short golden age
TEXT.Spanish: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to trigger a short golden age

TEXT.English: The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:
TEXT.French: Le pouvoir du berceau de la civilisation :
TEXT.German: Die Macht der Wiege der Zivilisation:
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la ley:

TEXT.English: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered
TEXT.French: Une technologie gratuite pour les cinq premières technologies découvertes
TEXT.German: Erhält eine weitere Technologie für die ersten fünf entdeckten Technologien
TEXT.Italian: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered
TEXT.Spanish: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered

TEXT.French: The Power of Cordiality:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Cordiality:

TEXT.English: Cities are guaranteed to celebrate if they meet the requirements
TEXT.French: Cities are guaranteed to celebrate if they meet the requirements
TEXT.German: Cities are guaranteed to celebrate if they meet the requirements
TEXT.Italian: Cities are guaranteed to celebrate if they meet the requirements
TEXT.Spanish: Cities are guaranteed to celebrate if they meet the requirements

TEXT.French: The Power of Dharma Kings:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Dharma Kings:

TEXT.English: Can use unlimited Great Prophets to start Golden Ages
TEXT.French: Can use unlimited Great Prophets to start Golden Ages
TEXT.German: Can use unlimited Great Prophets to start Golden Ages
TEXT.Italian: Can use unlimited Great Prophets to start Golden Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Can use unlimited Great Prophets to start Golden Ages

TEXT.French: The Power of Splendor:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Splendor:

TEXT.English: Additional [ICON_ESPIONAGE] for every 100 [ICON_GOLD] in treasury and additional [ICON_GOLD] for every 200 [ICON_CULTURE] in the capital
TEXT.French: Additional [ICON_ESPIONAGE] for every 100 [ICON_GOLD] in treasury and additional [ICON_GOLD] for every 200 [ICON_CULTURE] in the capital
TEXT.German: Additional [ICON_ESPIONAGE] for every 100 [ICON_GOLD] in treasury and additional [ICON_GOLD] for every 200 [ICON_CULTURE] in the capital
TEXT.Italian: Additional [ICON_ESPIONAGE] for every 100 [ICON_GOLD] in treasury and additional [ICON_GOLD] for every 200 [ICON_CULTURE] in the capital
TEXT.Spanish: Additional [ICON_ESPIONAGE] for every 100 [ICON_GOLD] in treasury and additional [ICON_GOLD] for every 200 [ICON_CULTURE] in the capital

TEXT.French: The Power of Multilateralism:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Multilateralism:

TEXT.English: Double trade route yield from years of peace
TEXT.French: Double trade route yield from years of peace
TEXT.German: Double trade route yield from years of peace
TEXT.Italian: Double trade route yield from years of peace
TEXT.Spanish: Double trade route yield from years of peace

TEXT.English: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.French: En s'établissant à %s1, des immigrants ont accéléré de %d3 points l'apparition d'un %s2.
TEXT.German: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.Italian: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
TEXT.Spanish: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des mercenaires :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de los mercenarios:

TEXT.English: Can always hurry units with gold and pays half the cost and no extra upkeep for hurried units
TEXT.French: L'accélération des unités est toujours disponible et coûte deux fois moins cher ; pas de coût d'entretien supplémentaire pour ces unités
TEXT.German: Kann immer Einheiten mit Gold beschleunigen und bezahlt halbe Kosten und keinen zusätzlicher Unterhalt für beschleunigte Einheiten
TEXT.Italian: Dimezzati i costi di assunzione e mantenimento dei mercenari
TEXT.Spanish: Se reducen a la mitad los costes de contratación y mantenimiento de mercenarios

TEXT.French: The Power of Druids:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Druids:

TEXT.English: Units in forests heal at the same rate as in friendly cities
TEXT.French: Units in forests heal at the same rate as in friendly cities
TEXT.German: Units in forests heal at the same rate as in friendly cities
TEXT.Italian: Units in forests heal at the same rate as in friendly cities
TEXT.Spanish: Units in forests heal at the same rate as in friendly cities

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des myriades:
TEXT.Spanish: El poder del invento:

TEXT.English: Cities keep an additional 25% [ICON_FOOD] after growing
TEXT.French: Les villes conservent 25 % [ICON_FOOD] de plus après la croissance
TEXT.German: Städte behalten zusätzliche 25% [ICON_FOOD] nach dem Wachsen
TEXT.Italian: Velocità di addestramento 1,5X per le unità da mischia e con armi da fuoco
TEXT.Spanish: Velocidad de entrenamiento de unidades de cuerpo a cuerpo y con armas de pólvora multiplicada x1,5

TEXT.French: Filial and Incorrupt:
TEXT.Spanish: Filial and Incorrupt:

TEXT.English: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] per statesman and free statesmen in the capital
TEXT.French: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] per statesman and free statesmen in the capital
TEXT.German: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] per statesman and free statesmen in the capital
TEXT.Italian: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] per statesman and free statesmen in the capital
TEXT.Spanish: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] per statesman and free statesmen in the capital

TEXT.French: Le Pouvoir de la maneouvre:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Maneouvre::

TEXT.French: Free disengage promotion for units
TEXT.Spanish: Free disengage promotion for units

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir du libérateur :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Liberator:

TEXT.English: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.French: Pas de résistance à la conquête de villes en Amérique latine
TEXT.German: Keinen Widerstand in eroberten Städten in Lateinamerika
TEXT.Italian: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.Spanish: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: %s1 a levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: %s1 hat eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer %s2!
TEXT.French: %s1 a levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: %s1 hat eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.French: The Power of Trade Guilds:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Trade Guilds:

TEXT.English: +10% foreign trade route yield for every traded resource
TEXT.French: +10% foreign trade route yield for every traded resource
TEXT.German: +10% foreign trade route yield for every traded resource
TEXT.Italian: +10% foreign trade route yield for every traded resource
TEXT.Spanish: +10% foreign trade route yield for every traded resource

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir du pharaon :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder del faraón:

TEXT.English: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start
TEXT.French: La monarchie, la redistribution et la déification sont activées au départ
TEXT.German: Aktivierung von Monarchie, Umverteilung und Vergötterung beim Spielstart
TEXT.Italian: All'avvio sono abilitati governo ereditario e schiavitù
TEXT.Spanish: Gobierno hereditario y Esclavitud están activados al principio

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de l'indirect rule :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la Royal Navy:

TEXT.English: Reduced colony maintenance from number of colonies per continent
TEXT.French: Reduced colony maintenance from number of colonies per continent
TEXT.German: Geringerer Kolonie-Unterhalt durch die Anzahl Kolonien pro Kontinent
TEXT.Italian: Reduced colony maintenance from number of colonies per continent
TEXT.Spanish: Reduced colony maintenance from number of colonies per continent

TEXT.French: The Power of Highlands:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Highlands:

TEXT.English: +1 [ICON_FOOD] on hill tiles that yield at least one [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.French: +1 [ICON_FOOD] on hill tiles that yield at least one [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.German: +1 [ICON_FOOD] on hill tiles that yield at least one [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Italian: +1 [ICON_FOOD] on hill tiles that yield at least one [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Spanish: +1 [ICON_FOOD] on hill tiles that yield at least one [ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la diplomatie :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la entente:

TEXT.English: Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses
TEXT.French: Les pénalités diplomatiques expirent plus vite, et les autres civilisations sont plus enclines à voter pour vous lors des congrès
TEXT.German: Diplomatische Mali verfallen schneller; höhere Wahrscheinlichkeit, Stimmen in Kongressen zu erhalten
TEXT.Italian: Le altre civiltà hanno un atteggiamento più amichevole
TEXT.Spanish: Las demás civilizaciones mantienen una actitud más amistosa

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la doctrine militaire :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Doctrine:

TEXT.English: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
TEXT.French: Les unités conservent toute leur expérience lorsqu'elles sont améliorées
TEXT.German: Modernisierte Einheiten behalten ihre gesamte Erfahrung
TEXT.Italian: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
TEXT.Spanish: Units retain all their experience when upgraded

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la philosophie :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la filosofía:

TEXT.English: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era
TEXT.French: Le taux de natalité des personnages illustres est augmenté de 150 % jusqu'à la fin de l'Ère classique
TEXT.German: +150% Geburtenrate von Großen Persönlichkeiten bis zum Ende des klassischen Zeitalters
TEXT.Italian: +150% tasso di natalità dei Grandi Personaggi fino alla fine del Medioevo
TEXT.Spanish: +100% a la tasa de natalidad de grandes personajes hasta el final de la Edad Media

TEXT.English: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: Les Grecs ont levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: Die Griechen haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de l'assainissement :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Sanitation:

TEXT.English: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.French: Les points de santé en excès contribuent à la croissance des villes pendant l'Ère antique
TEXT.German: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.Italian: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
TEXT.Spanish: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era

TEXT.French: The Power of Charcoal:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Charcoal:

TEXT.English: Melee units can chop down forests
TEXT.French: Melee units can chop down forests
TEXT.German: Melee units can chop down forests
TEXT.Italian: Melee units can chop down forests
TEXT.Spanish: Melee units can chop down forests

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des compagnies commerciales :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la Compañía de las Indias:

TEXT.English: Doubled yield and commerce from the trading company corporation
TEXT.French: Les rendements de la Compagnie commerciale sont doublés
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità marittime possono entrare in territorio nemico
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las unidades marítimas pueden entrar en territorio enemigo

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de l'investiture :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Investiture:

TEXT.English: Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.French: La vistesse de construction des bâtiments liés à la religion d'État est doublée
TEXT.German: Doppelte Baugeschwindigkeit für Gebäude der Staatsreligion
TEXT.Italian: Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.Spanish: Double construction speed of state religion buildings

TEXT.English: Our population in %s1 is growing due to immigrants from the Old World!
TEXT.French: Notre population augmente grâce aux immigrants du Vieux Monde !
TEXT.German: Unsere Bevölkerung in %s1 wächst durch Einwanderer aus der Alten Welt!
TEXT.Italian: La nostra popolazione sta crescendo grazie agli immigranti dal vecchio mondo!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Nuestra población está creciendo como consecuencia de la inmigración procedente del Viejo Mundo!

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des terrasses :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de las terrazas:

TEXT.French: Les montagnes produisent 2 nourritures et 1 marteau
TEXT.Italian: Le montagne producono 2 cibo e 1 scudo
TEXT.Spanish: Las montañas producen 2 alimentos y 1 martillo

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la pureté :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la espiritualidad:

TEXT.English: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] from buildings that provide [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.French: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] from buildings that provide [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.German: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] from buildings that provide [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Italian: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] from buildings that provide [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Spanish: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] from buildings that provide [ICON_HAPPY]

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir du Safavieh :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Safaviyya:

TEXT.French: Les bâtiments religieux produisent +2 [ICON_CULTURE] et +2 [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.Spanish: Religious buildings produce +2 [ICON_CULTURE] and +2 [ICON_RESEARCH]

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la Renaissance :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Renaissance:

TEXT.English: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.French: Un spécialiste gratuit par ville jusqu'à l'Ère industrielle
TEXT.German: Zusätzlicher Spezialist in allen Städten bis zum Industriezeitalter
TEXT.Italian: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.Spanish: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la modernisation :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder del honor:

TEXT.English: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.French: Après avoir découvert toutes les technologies médiévales, chaque technologie coûte -50 % [ICON_RESEARCH] si trois civilisations sont disposées à l'échanger
TEXT.German: Nachdem alle Technologien des Mittelalters entdeckt wurden, kostet jede Technologie -50% [ICON_RESEARCH], die drei andere Zivilisationen zu tauschen bereit sind
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le unità militari terrestri hanno un bonus in difesa delle città
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las unidades militares terrestres tienen una bonificación al defender ciudades

TEXT.French: The Power of Island Agriculture:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Island Agriculture:

TEXT.English: Improvements that provide food have twice the effect on islands
TEXT.French: Improvements that provide food have twice the effect on islands
TEXT.German: Improvements that provide food have twice the effect on islands
TEXT.Italian: Improvements that provide food have twice the effect on islands
TEXT.Spanish: Improvements that provide food have twice the effect on islands

TEXT.French: The Power of Canals:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Canals:

TEXT.English: Can convert production into food in your capital
TEXT.French: Can convert production into food in your capital
TEXT.German: Can convert production into food in your capital
TEXT.Italian: Can convert production into food in your capital
TEXT.Spanish: Can convert production into food in your capital

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des tropiques :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Tropics:

TEXT.English: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.French: Les jungles, les forêts tropicales et les marécages rapportent de la nourriture et de la production, et ne causent pas de maladie
TEXT.German: Dschungel, Regenwälder und Marschen geben zusätzliche Nahrung und Produktion und verursachen keine Krankheit
TEXT.Italian: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.Spanish: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de l'éducation :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Education:

TEXT.French: Vous pouvez embaucher deux fois plus de spécialistes dans la capitale
TEXT.German: Doppelte Anzahl verfügbarer Spezialisten in der Hauptstadt
TEXT.Spanish: Double specialist slots in capital

TEXT.French: The Power of Syncretism:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Syncretism:

TEXT.English: Spreading a religion that is not the owner's state religion grants additional gold
TEXT.French: Spreading a religion that is not the owner's state religion grants additional gold
TEXT.German: Spreading a religion that is not the owner's state religion grants additional gold
TEXT.Italian: Spreading a religion that is not the owner's state religion grants additional gold
TEXT.Spanish: Spreading a religion that is not the owner's state religion grants additional gold

TEXT.French: We gained %d1 [ICON_GOLD] after spreading %s2 to %s3.
TEXT.Spanish: We gained %d1 [ICON_GOLD] after spreading %s2 to %s3.

TEXT.French: The Power of Straits:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Straits:

TEXT.English: +2 trade routes for cities with different landmasses within their third ring
TEXT.French: +2 trade routes for cities with different landmasses within their third ring
TEXT.German: +2 trade routes for cities with different landmasses within their third ring
TEXT.Italian: +2 trade routes for cities with different landmasses within their third ring
TEXT.Spanish: +2 trade routes for cities with different landmasses within their third ring

TEXT.English: The Power of Long Distance Trade:
TEXT.French: The Power of Long Distance Trade:
TEXT.German: The Power of Long Distance Trade:
TEXT.Italian: The Power of Long Distance Trade:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Long Distance Trade:

TEXT.English: Double trade yield from distance for inland cities and desert provides trade connections
TEXT.French: Double trade yield from distance for inland cities and desert provides trade connections
TEXT.German: Double trade yield from distance for inland cities and desert provides trade connections
TEXT.Italian: Double trade yield from distance for inland cities and desert provides trade connections
TEXT.Spanish: Double trade yield from distance for inland cities and desert provides trade connections

TEXT.English: The Power of the Long Count:
TEXT.French: Le pouvoir du compte long :
TEXT.Italian: The Power of the Long Count:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Long Count:

TEXT.English: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
TEXT.French: Les villes reçoivent de la nourriture lors de la découverte de technologies avant le Moyen Âge
TEXT.German: Städte erhalten zusätzliche Nahrung für jede Technologie, die vor dem Mittelalter entdeckt wird
TEXT.Italian: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages

TEXT.French: The Power of Positivism:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Positivism:

TEXT.French: Converts +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] to [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.Spanish: Converts +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] to [ICON_RESEARCH]

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la terreur :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la horda:

TEXT.English: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest
TEXT.French: Les villes menacées par vos armées deviennent agitées
TEXT.German: Von Ihren Streitkräften bedrohte Städte verfallen in Unruhe
TEXT.Italian: Ogni città distrutta fa sì che le città nemiche vicine si arrendano, se avvicinate
TEXT.Spanish: Una ciudad arrasada provoca que las ciudades enemigas cercanas se rindan al aproximarse

TEXT.English: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!
TEXT.French: Vos succès de conquête ont fait grandir votre horde !
TEXT.German: Eure erfolgreichen Eroberungen haben Eure Horde wachsen lassen!
TEXT.Italian: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!
TEXT.Spanish: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!

TEXT.English: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!
TEXT.French: Les habitants de %s1 tremblent de peur à l'approche de nos armées !
TEXT.German: Die Bürger von %s1 erzittern vor Furcht vor unseren anrückenden Truppen!
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!

TEXT.English: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
TEXT.French: Effrayés par l'approche des armées mongoles, les habitants de %s1 ont abandonné leurs défenses !
TEXT.German: Aus Furcht vor den anrückenden mongolischen Armeen haben die Bürger von %s1 ihre Stellungen aufgegeben!
TEXT.Italian: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
TEXT.Spanish: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!

TEXT.French: Les citoyens de
TEXT.Spanish: Los ciudadanos de

TEXT.English: fear the same fate of their neighbour inhabitants and surrender!
TEXT.French: craignent de subir le même sort que leurs voisins et se rendent !
TEXT.German: fürchten, dass sie dasselbe Schicksal ereilt wie ihre Nachbarn, und kapitulieren!
TEXT.Italian: temono di subire lo stesso fato dei vicini e si arrendono!
TEXT.Spanish: temen sufrir el mismo destino que sus vecinos y se rinden.

TEXT.French: The Power of Horticulture:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Horticulture:

TEXT.French: +2 [ICON_FOOD] from Orchard
TEXT.Spanish: +2 [ICON_FOOD] from Orchard

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de l'architecture :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Architecture:

TEXT.English: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
TEXT.French: Au moment de compléter un bâtiment, les villes reçoivent en culture la moitié du coût de construction
TEXT.German: Städte erhalten die Hälfte der Baukosten als Kultur, wenn ein Gebäude errichtet wird
TEXT.Italian: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
TEXT.Spanish: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed

TEXT.French: The Power of Baqt:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Baqt:

TEXT.English: No negative attitude from different state religion
TEXT.French: No negative attitude from different state religion
TEXT.German: No negative attitude from different state religion
TEXT.Italian: No negative attitude from different state religion
TEXT.Spanish: No negative attitude from different state religion

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des satrapies :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la satrapía:

TEXT.English: Additional stability for recently conquered cities
TEXT.French: Stabilité additionnelle pour les villes récemment conquises
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Stabilität für kürzlich eroberte Städte
TEXT.Italian: Additional stability for recently conquered cities
TEXT.Spanish: Additional stability for recently conquered cities

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la navigation :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Navigation:

TEXT.English: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.French: Pas de pénalité pour l'expansion culturelle sur les cases d'océan
TEXT.German: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Italian: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Spanish: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles

TEXT.French: The Power of Folwarks:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Folwarks:

TEXT.French: Extra [ICON_COMMERCE] from Farms and Pastures
TEXT.Spanish: Extra [ICON_COMMERCE] from Farms and Pastures

TEXT.French: The Power of Cartaz:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Cartaz:

TEXT.English: +1 trade route in overseas colonies until the Industrial era
TEXT.French: +1 trade route in overseas colonies until the Industrial era
TEXT.German: +1 Handelsroute in Kolonien vor dem Industriezeitalter
TEXT.Italian: +1 trade route in overseas colonies until the Industrial era
TEXT.Spanish: +1 trade route in overseas colonies until the Industrial era

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de l'infrastructure :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la infraestructura:

TEXT.English: Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed.
TEXT.French: Les bâtiments déjà présents dans votre capitale sont construits 30 % plus vite
TEXT.German: Gebäude, die bereits in der Hauptstadt errichtet wurden, erhalten +30% Baugeschwindigkeit.
TEXT.Italian: Le strade all'interno dei confini romani permettono movimento delle unità 4X invece di 2X
TEXT.Spanish: Las carreteras dentro de las fronteras romanas permiten un movimiento de unidades multiplicado x4 en lugar de x2

TEXT.English: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.French: Une armée a été levée pour attaquer %s1_civ_adjective !
TEXT.German: Eine Armee wurde zusammengestellt zum Angriff auf %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.Italian: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.Spanish: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!

TEXT.English: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: Les Romains ont levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: Die Römer haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
TEXT.French: Vos victoires triomphantes vous ont permis de lever une autre légion !
TEXT.German: Eure triumphalen Siege haben Euch ermöglicht, eine weitere Legion auszuheben!
TEXT.Italian: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
TEXT.Spanish: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!

TEXT.French: The Power of Hardship:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Hardship:

TEXT.English: Unhappiness from hurrying and drafting is applied to your happiest city
TEXT.French: Unhappiness from hurrying and drafting is applied to your happiest city
TEXT.German: Unhappiness from hurrying and drafting is applied to your happiest city
TEXT.Italian: Unhappiness from hurrying and drafting is applied to your happiest city
TEXT.Spanish: Unhappiness from hurrying and drafting is applied to your happiest city

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la découverte :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder del descubrimiento:

TEXT.French: Les unités navales reçoivent +2 points de mouvement
TEXT.Italian: Le unità navali ricevono +2 punti di movimento
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades navales nuevas reciben +2 puntos de movimiento

TEXT.French: The Power of Palm Trees:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Palm Trees:

TEXT.English: Can construct coastal improvements without removing Savannas and Forests
TEXT.French: Can construct coastal improvements without removing Savannas and Forests
TEXT.German: Can construct coastal improvements without removing Savannas and Forests
TEXT.Italian: Can construct coastal improvements without removing Savannas and Forests
TEXT.Spanish: Can construct coastal improvements without removing Savannas and Forests

TEXT.French: The Power of Lagom:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Lagom:

TEXT.French: Celebrating cities gain +50% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] birth rate
TEXT.Spanish: Celebrating cities gain +50% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] birth rate

TEXT.English: The Dravidians have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: The Dravidians have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.German: The Dravidians have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Italian: The Dravidians have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: The Dravidians have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.French: The Power of Embassies:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Embassies:

TEXT.English: Can never lose contact with another civilization
TEXT.French: Can never lose contact with another civilization
TEXT.German: Kann niemals den Kontakt mit anderen Zivilisationen verlieren
TEXT.Italian: Can never lose contact with another civilization
TEXT.Spanish: Can never lose contact with another civilization

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des missionnaires :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Missionaries:

TEXT.English: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
TEXT.French: Pas de limite de missionnaires ; les missionnaires peuvent entrer en territoire étranger
TEXT.German: Kann unbegrenzt Missionare ausbilden; Missionare können fremdes Territorium betreten
TEXT.Italian: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
TEXT.Spanish: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory

TEXT.French: The Power of Artisans:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Artisans:

TEXT.French: Specialists produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] and +2 [ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.Spanish: Specialists produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] and +2 [ICON_CULTURE]

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir de la horde :
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Orda:

TEXT.English: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime
TEXT.French: En temps de paix, les barbares ne peuvent pas entrer dans votre territoire ; en temps de guerre, les barbares montés se joignent à votre armée si vous les attaquez
TEXT.German: Barbaren können Ihr Territorium in Friedenszeiten nicht betreten und berittene Barbaren, die in Kriegszeiten angegriffen werden, treten Ihren Armeen bei
TEXT.Italian: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime
TEXT.Spanish: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir du devchirmé :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de la asimilación:

TEXT.English: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez enrôler deux unités supplémentaires dans les villes adeptes de religions non officielles
TEXT.German: Kann zwei zusätzliche Einheiten in Städten mit Nicht-Staatsreligionen rekrutieren
TEXT.Italian: La maggioranza di cultura straniera nelle città turche è convertita in cultura turca
TEXT.Spanish: La mayor parte de la cultura extranjera en ciudades turcas se convierte a cultura turca

TEXT.French: The Power of Varangians:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Varangians:

TEXT.English: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] for unimproved land tiles in your trade network
TEXT.French: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] for unimproved land tiles in your trade network
TEXT.German: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] for unimproved land tiles in your trade network
TEXT.Italian: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] for unimproved land tiles in your trade network
TEXT.Spanish: +1 [ICON_COMMERCE] for unimproved land tiles in your trade network

TEXT.French: The Power of Resistance:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Resistance:

TEXT.English: When attacking within their own territory, units receive the defensive bonus of their current tile
TEXT.French: When attacking within their own territory, units receive the defensive bonus of their current tile
TEXT.German: When attacking within their own territory, units receive the defensive bonus of their current tile
TEXT.Italian: When attacking within their own territory, units receive the defensive bonus of their current tile
TEXT.Spanish: When attacking within their own territory, units receive the defensive bonus of their current tile

TEXT.French: Le pouvoir des raids :
TEXT.Spanish: El poder del pillaje:

TEXT.English: Additional gold from pillaging, sacking cities and sinking ships during the Middle Ages
TEXT.French: Piller, saccager des villes et couler des navires vous rapporte de l'or supplémentaire pendant le Moyen Âge
TEXT.German: Zusätzliches gold durch Plünderung von Städten und Verbesserungen und das Versenken von Schiffen während des Mittelalters
TEXT.Spanish: Se obtiene oro x5 del pillaje

TEXT.French: The Power of Slave Soldiers:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Slave Soldiers:

TEXT.English: All land units start with Combat I promotion, but have increased upkeep
TEXT.French: All land units start with Combat I promotion, but have increased upkeep
TEXT.German: All land units start with Combat I promotion, but have increased upkeep
TEXT.Italian: All land units start with Combat I promotion, but have increased upkeep
TEXT.Spanish: All land units start with Combat I promotion, but have increased upkeep

TEXT.French: The Power of Generalship:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Generalship:

TEXT.English: Start with the Stratocracy civic and a free Great General
TEXT.French: Start with the Stratocracy civic and a free Great General
TEXT.German: Start with the Stratocracy civic and a free Great General
TEXT.Italian: Start with the Stratocracy civic and a free Great General
TEXT.Spanish: Start with the Stratocracy civic and a free Great General

TEXT.French: The Power of Tribal Integration:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of Tribal Integration:

TEXT.English: Razing a city starts a Golden Age
TEXT.French: Razing a city starts a Golden Age
TEXT.German: Razing a city starts a Golden Age
TEXT.Italian: Razing a city starts a Golden Age
TEXT.Spanish: Razing a city starts a Golden Age
